markdownRemark.html: This beach is located in the natural area Marismas de Isla Cristina which is an ecological protected zone. No swimming for humans here, but your dog will love playing in the white sand and maybe catching a crab or two in the rocks.

frontmatter.title: Beach of the Gola in Isla Cristina
frontmatter.description: Beach of the Gola in Isla Cristina - This beach is located in the natural area Marismas de Isla Cristina which is an ecological protected zone. No swimming for humans here, but your dog will love playing in the white sand and maybe catching a crab or two in the rocks.
